meanings.definition: A tropical tree of the figwort family, with large leaves and spikes of small flowers.
meanings.sent1: The cecropia tree in the jungle provides shade with its broad leaves.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful cecropia tree with colorful flowers in the botanical garden.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys played hide-and-seek around the cecropia tree, peeking from behind its leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bloomed like a cecropia flower, brightening the room.
meanings.sent5: The cecropia tree stood tall like a green umbrella, sheltering the forest creatures from the sun.

meanings.definition: A genus of moths, the larvae of which feed on the leaves of the cecropia tree.
meanings.sent1: The cecropia moth fluttered gracefully in the moonlit garden.
meanings.sent2: The caterpillars of the cecropia moth voraciously devoured the leaves of the tree.
meanings.sent3: The cecropia moth invited all its moth friends for a leaf-eating party on the tree.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams floated like delicate cecropia moth wings, light and fleeting.
meanings.sent5: The cecropia moth larvae wove silky webs around the tree, creating a magical tapestry.
